"The Seasonal Event":
"Seasonal Events are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change, and limited-time Rappies will appear."

"During this Seasonal Event, the ARKS Technology R&D Member, Xiemmy, appears in all ARKS bases.

Xiemmy will offer you Limited Time Tasks, and will also trade items in exchange for Seasonal Points."

"During this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

To learn more about Seasonal Events, talk to Xiemmy and select \"Ask about the Seasonal Event\"."
